# TorchEBM

> Energy-Based Modeling library for PyTorch

TorchEBM is an Energy-Based Modeling library for PyTorch that provides tools for 
sampling, inference, and learning in complex distributions. It supports classical 
EBMs via MCMC sampling and modern flow/diffusion-based generative models.

Key components:
- Samplers: LangevinDynamics, HamiltonianMonteCarlo, FlowSampler, GradientDescentSampler
- Losses: ContrastiveDivergence, ScoreMatching, EquilibriumMatchingLoss
- Interpolants: LinearInterpolant, CosineInterpolant, VariancePreservingInterpolant
- Integrators: EulerMaruyama, Heun, Leapfrog
- Models: ConditionalTransformer2D, neural network components
- Datasets: TwoMoons, EightGaussians, SwissRoll, and more synthetic datasets


## Getting Started

- [Home](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/index.md): Main documentation page for TorchEBM
- [Getting Started](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/tutorials/getting_started/index.md): Quick start tutorial

## Core Concepts

- [Samplers](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/tutorials/samplers/index.md): Guide to MCMC samplers
- [Loss Functions](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/tutorials/loss_functions/index.md): Loss functions for EBM training
- [Training EBMs](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/tutorials/training/index.md): Training energy-based models

## API Reference

- [Torchebm &gt; Core](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/core/index.md): Core base classes
- [Torchebm &gt; Samplers](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/samplers/index.md): Sampling algorithms
- [Torchebm &gt; Losses](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/losses/index.md): Training objectives
- [Torchebm &gt; Interpolants](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/interpolants/index.md): Interpolation schemes
- [Torchebm &gt; Integrators](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/integrators/index.md): Numerical integrators
- [Torchebm &gt; Models](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/models/index.md): Neural network architectures
- [Torchebm &gt; Datasets](https://soran-ghaderi.github.io/torchebm/0.5.4.dev3/api/torchebm/datasets/index.md): Data generators
